auth.signInPrompt: Sign in to your account to continue learning
auth.resetPasswordPrompt: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.logoutPrompt: Please wait while we sign you out...

errors.nameTooLong: Name must be less than 100 characters
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordComplexity: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number
errors.newPasswordDifferent: New password must be different from current password
errors.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email address before signing in
errors.userAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please try again later
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection

success.checkEmail: Account created! Please check your email to confirm your account.
success.resetLinkSent: Password reset link sent to your email
success.resetEmailSentSuffix: , you will receive a password reset link shortly.

decks.title: My Decks
decks.subtitle: Manage your flashcard collections
decks.createFirstDeck: Create your first deck to start learning
decks.deckNameHelp: Give your flashcard deck a descriptive name. You can change it later.
decks.learnWithAI: Create your first deck to start learning. Add cards, organize by topic, and track your progress with spaced repetition.

flashcards.title: Flashcards
flashcards.frontTooLong: Front content must be less than 1000 characters
flashcards.backTooLong: Back content must be less than 1000 characters
flashcards.editDescription: Update the front and back content of this flashcard.
flashcards.createCardDescription: Create a new flashcard with front and back content.
flashcards.generateDescription: Generate flashcards automatically using AI from your source text.
flashcards.sourceTextPlaceholder: Paste your text content here (1000-10000 characters)
flashcards.tip1: Use clear, structured content with headings and bullet points
flashcards.tip2: Include definitions, examples, and key concepts
flashcards.tip3: Break down complex topics into smaller, focused sections
flashcards.tip4: Review and refine the generated cards for accuracy
flashcards.emptyDescription: Create your first flashcard to start learning.
flashcards.deleteCardDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this card? This action cannot be undone.

review.title: Review Generated Cards
review.description: Review and curate your AI-generated flashcards
review.deleteCardDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this card? This action cannot be undone.
review.acceptAllDescription: Accept all pending cards for addition to your deck.
review.deleteAllDescription: Delete all pending cards. This action cannot be undone.
review.noCardsDescription: No cards were generated. Try again with different content.
review.confirmCloseEditing: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?
review.keyboardHints: Press {{space}} to reveal • Press {{keys}} to rate

profile.title: Profile
profile.themeDescription: Toggle between light and dark mode
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.deckNameTooLong: Deck name must be less than 255 characters
settings.deleteDeckWarning: Deleting a deck is permanent and cannot be undone. All flashcards in this deck will be deleted.
settings.deleteDeckConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this deck? This action cannot be undone.

error.retryPageTitle: Retry the page that caused the error
